translation.en: So, the headline would read "So-and-so denies funding terrorists."
translation.ja: 見出しは“テロリストへの 資金提供を否定”か

translation.en: -Great. -That's unethical, though.
translation.ja: 非倫理的だ

translation.en: Yeah, but it's news. What's a popular Spanish name?
translation.ja: ニュースだぞ 一般的なスペイン人名は？

translation.en: Alvarez. Santiago. Emilio.
translation.ja: アルバレス　サンチアゴ エミリオ

translation.en: [Frank] The man is Emilio Santiago Alvarez,
translation.ja: 男の名前はエミリオ･ サンチアゴ･アルバレス

translation.en: the instigator of the attacks against government forces in Ecuador.
translation.ja: 政府軍に対する反乱を 扇動した人物です

translation.en: A small man, with no profile, no international presence.
translation.ja: 世界的に知られた大物では ありませんが⸺

translation.en: But here, in the jungles and towns of southern Ecuador, he's become a folk hero...
translation.ja: エクアドルのジャングルで 民衆の英雄になりました

translation.en: a man unafraid to stand up and be counted.
translation.ja: 恐れず立ち上がった勇者です

translation.en: But on the street, rumors persist that Alvarez may not be working alone.
translation.ja: しかしアルバレスには 噂がつきまといます

translation.en: His rebel forces are too well equipped, too well trained, too well fed.
translation.ja: 彼が率いる反乱軍は 高度に訓練されています

translation.en: It's said, and I must stress at this point, these rumors are uncorroborated...
translation.ja: これは噂の域を出ませんが アルバレスには⸺

translation.en: that maybe Alvarez has friends in high places.
translation.ja: 強力な支援者が⸺ いるようです

translation.en: Perhaps a little too close to home.
translation.ja: 我々の身近なところに

translation.en: Jesus, is he saying that the rebel forces are being funded by the U.S.?
translation.ja: アメリカが資金提供を してると？

translation.en: [Frank] This is Frank Bonneville, Q365 News.
translation.ja: Ｑ365ニュースの ボネビルでした

translation.en: [Mallard] That's huge.
translation.ja: デカい 次のニュースです

translation.en: Good one. Couldn't have done better myself.
translation.ja: すごい　さすがだ

translation.en: -We can keep this going for ages. -Yeah, let's see if they buy it first.
translation.ja: 永遠にやれる リスナーが信じればな

translation.en: -They will. -[gunfire on video game]
translation.ja: 信じるさ

translation.en: They will.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ

translation.en: [Secretary of State] Does Bonneville realize the mess he's made
translation.ja: 自分の発言が もたらした混乱を⸺

translation.en: by allowing speculation that this Alvarez is working for the Americans?
translation.ja: 自分の発言が もたらした混乱を⸺ ボネビルは理解してる？

translation.en: Most probably, Madam Secretary.
translation.ja: たぶん　国務長官

translation.en: Goddamn it. Why have we not heard of this man before? Where's your intelligence?
translation.ja: なぜアルバレスのことを 誰も知らないの？

translation.en: Our agents in Ecuador are tracing him now.
translation.ja: 現在 エクアドル内で 調査中です

translation.en: It's a good chance they know him by another name. A nickname.
translation.ja: 別の名前で 知られているのでしょう

translation.en: And if they don't find him, government forces will.
translation.ja: いずれ見つけ出します

translation.en: They're now looking for Bonneville to make him confess his sources.
translation.ja: ボネビルに 情報源を明かさせる

translation.en: And Alvarez's men are after him because he revealed too much.
translation.ja: アルバレスは 知りすぎた奴を狙うだろう

translation.en: He and his technician are in serious danger.
translation.ja: ２人の命が危ない

translation.en: I do not wanna end up with two dead citizens nor the wrath of their families.
translation.ja: 彼らを殺させるわけには いかないわ

translation.en: You are going to tell Finch and Bonneville to get to the American embassy in Quito
translation.ja: フィンチとボネビルをキトの アメリカ大使館へ行かせて

translation.en: as soon as possible. We need to know they're safe.
translation.ja: フィンチとボネビルをキトの アメリカ大使館へ行かせて 安全確認を

translation.en: Once they're safe, we will extract them.
translation.ja: それから情報を吐かせます

translation.en: That is something we know how to do.
translation.ja: やり方は心得てる

translation.en: Little is known about the mastermind behind the uprising, rebel fighter Emilio Alvarez.
translation.ja: 謎多き反乱軍リーダー エミリオ･アルバレス

translation.en: The charismatic leader of the Ecuadorian Liberation Front is believed to come from humble beginnings.
translation.ja: 解放戦線の英雄は 貧しい家庭で育ちました

translation.en: The son of an unemployed, left-wing atheist father and an unmarried mother with Communist sympathies.
translation.ja: 父親は無職で無神論者 母親は共産主義者です

translation.en: So, in your view, Alvarez has been quietly amassing a force for some time now.
translation.ja: アルバレスは以前から 準備していたと？

translation.en: What I'm hearing from my sources is that Alvarez has risen to a position of power in the Ecuadorian Liberation Front for some years.
translation.ja: 解放戦線の指導的地位に 就いたのは 数年前です

translation.en: I always knew he made up most of the shit he reported.
translation.ja: ねつ造の常習犯だな

translation.en: So, why haven't we heard of him before?
translation.ja: でも今頃 話題に？

translation.en: -Well, it makes perfect sense. -How is he keeping a straight face?
translation.ja: それも当然です 平然としてる

translation.en: ...less chance for the opposition of targeting you. Successful revolution is all about protecting your leaders.
translation.ja: リーダーを守らなければ 革命の成功はありません

translation.en: So, Frank Bonneville has gone where no other news reporter has gone before
translation.ja: ボネビルが アルバレスの存在を⸺

translation.en: in bringing this man to the public's attention.
translation.ja: 突き止めたと？

translation.en: -I wouldn't say that. -[cackling]
translation.ja: それは違います

translation.en: I've known about Alvarez myself for a while now. I just didn't think it was appropriate to unmask him yet.
translation.ja: 私も知っていましたが 明かすのは早すぎると

translation.en: [Finch] Oh, come on.
translation.ja: よく言うぜ

translation.en: Hello? Yeah.
translation.ja: はい ああ

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure.
translation.ja: 分かった　もちろんだ

translation.en: Yeah, I'll call you as soon as we get to Quito.
translation.ja: キトに着いたら電話する

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.ja: すまんな

translation.en: -We're screwed. -Why?
translation.ja: ヤバい 何だ？

translation.en: -Everyone's looking for us, apparently. -They won't find us.
translation.ja: みんなが捜してる 見つからない

translation.en: Of course they won't, that's not the point.
translation.ja: そこが問題じゃない

translation.en: -What is? -Mallard wants us to get to
translation.ja: じゃ 何？ キトのアメリカ大使館に 行けと言われた

translation.en: the U.S. embassy in Quito immediately.
translation.ja: キトのアメリカ大使館に 行けと言われた

translation.en: For our own safety. The ambassador's waiting for us, okay?
translation.ja: キトのアメリカ大使館に 行けと言われた 大使が待ってる マチャラから車で数時間だ

translation.en: It's probably a few hours' drive from Machala to Quito.
translation.ja: 大使が待ってる マチャラから車で数時間だ

translation.en: I promised I'd call him as soon as we got there.
translation.ja: 到着でき次第 電話すると伝えた

translation.en: -As in, a few hours from now. -Right.
translation.ja: 到着でき次第 電話すると伝えた そうか

translation.en: -What are you gonna do? -Nothing.
translation.ja: どうする？ 何もしない

translation.en: -Because I'm not gonna call him. -Why not?
translation.ja: 電話もだ

translation.en: Because if I call him, he'll call the embassy to arrange us to be flown home,
translation.ja: 電話すれば大使館に伝わり 帰国を手配される

translation.en: -and they'll say we're not there. Right? -Right. Yeah.
translation.ja: だが俺たちは向こうにいない

translation.en: What will he think if you don't call him at all?
translation.ja: 電話がないと どう思う？

translation.en: -That something's happened to us. -We're just missing?
translation.ja: “何かあった”と 失踪したとか？

translation.en: Yeah, that we're missing. They can trace us, though.
translation.ja: そうだな 失踪者は追跡される

translation.en: That's what they'd do if they thought we were missing.
translation.ja: 失踪者は追跡される

translation.en: -So, we'd have to destroy our phones. -We only have to destroy the SIM card.
translation.ja: 電話を破壊すべきだ ＳＩＭカードを

translation.en: -Right. -Oh, God.
translation.ja: そうだな なんてこった

translation.en: How can you destroy it? It doesn't...
translation.ja: どうやれば破壊できるんだ

translation.en: You can't even... Shall I just swallow it?
translation.ja: どうやれば破壊できるんだ 飲み込む？

translation.en: Yeah, swallow it so they can trace it straight to your ass!
translation.ja: ケツの中まで追跡されるぞ

translation.en: Why didn't we just go back in the first place and just say: "Sorry, we threw away the tickets and passports"?
translation.ja: 振り出しに戻って 局に事情を話そう

translation.en: Why did you throw the fucking ticket and the passport away in the first place?
translation.ja: お前がパスポートを 捨てたのが始まりだ

translation.en: -[shouts] That's the fucking question! -Shut up!
translation.ja: お前がパスポートを 捨てたのが始まりだ 静かに！

translation.en: What will they think we're arguing about downstairs?
translation.ja: 下に聞こえるだろ

translation.en: -I don't care! -Are you mental?
translation.ja: 知るか！ イカれたか？

translation.en: Fucking hell. There. It's destroyed, okay?
translation.ja: まったく ほら　壊れたよ

translation.en: What are they gonna say, "What were you arguing about last night?" -In their house. -[sighs]
translation.ja: 人の家に泊まって怒鳴るなよ

translation.en: You're such a pig.
translation.ja: 失礼な男だ

translation.en: [Mallard] We haven't heard from them since 10:00 last night.
translation.ja: 昨晩10時から連絡がない

translation.en: Maybe they lost communication, maybe they've been arrested.
translation.ja: まさか拘束されたか

translation.en: Whatever the case, we need to be very quiet about this for now.
translation.ja: いずれにせよ この件は内密にしろ

translation.en: All right, drop everything, check the hotels, hospitals,
translation.ja: 君たちは ホテルや病院を当たれ

translation.en: anybody we might know in the area who might have seen them.
translation.ja: 君たちは ホテルや病院を当たれ イアンの奥さんにも連絡を

translation.en: And at some point, we have to let Ian's wife know.
translation.ja: イアンの奥さんにも連絡を

translation.en: -Leave it with me. -Okay.
translation.ja: 私がやります

translation.en: -[phone rings] -I need a map of Ecuador, ASAP.
translation.ja: エクアドルの地図を

translation.en: -[Claire] Got it. -Q365 News. Hold on.
translation.ja: 了解 Ｑ365ニュース　お待ちを

translation.en: It's Barrymore at the New York Post.
translation.ja: ポスト紙のバリモアよ

translation.en: [Barrymore] There's that little guy.
translation.ja: よお　マラード

translation.en: Okay, Barrymore, I gotta tell you, I don't have time. What?
translation.ja: 忙しいんだ　用件を言え

translation.en: I know you've got a big problem. I just spoke to my correspondent in Quito.

translation.en: I don't know anything. I can't say anything.
translation.ja: 何の話だ

translation.en: I need photos for a profile piece. Should I send a courier?
translation.ja: ２人の写真が欲しい

translation.en: -Being a bit hasty, aren't you? -If I know about it
translation.ja: 先走りすぎだ 世間に知れるのは 時間の問題だぞ

translation.en: then other people do, too, and it'll get out.
translation.ja: 世間に知れるのは 時間の問題だぞ

translation.en: Send your courier.
translation.ja: 誰か寄こせ

translation.en: Okay, story's out. Change of plans. You're going on at 7:00.
translation.ja: バレた ７時のニュースで話せ

translation.en: Just say we've lost contact with our special correspondents in Ecuador
translation.ja: エクアドル特派員が 行方不明だと伝えろ

translation.en: -but let's not panic everyone. -Right.
translation.ja: エクアドル特派員が 行方不明だと伝えろ はい

translation.en: -You got this. -Yeah.
translation.ja: できるか？ ええ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 頼むぞ

translation.en: Oh, hold on.
translation.ja: 待った

translation.en: Excuse me, have you got PC Gamer?
translation.ja: 「ＰＣゲーマー」を

translation.en: Look. Look.
translation.ja: 見ろよ

translation.en: And uh, and the New York Post.
translation.ja: ニューヨーク･ポストも ニューヨーク･ポストも 〝ジャーナリストが 失踪 〞

translation.en: Thanks. Cheers.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: -[Eleanor] Do you want a drink? -[Claire] Uh, no, I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.ja: 飲む？ いいえ　遠慮するわ

translation.en: You know, when you're in broadcasting...
translation.ja: こういう報道の仕事を してると⸺

translation.en: any number of things can happen, but they aren't necessarily serious.
translation.ja: いろいろあるけど 深刻とは限らない

translation.en: If that's the case, then they're gonna call any minute now.
translation.ja: 深刻な状況でなければ すぐ連絡が取れる

translation.en: Do you know Frank well?
translation.ja: フランクを？

translation.en: Uh, Frank?
translation.ja: フランクが何か？

translation.en: We've been working together for about five years.
translation.ja: 彼とは５年 一緒に働いてる

translation.en: He's a great journalist.
translation.ja: 優秀なジャーナリストよ

translation.en: Bit of a loner. But I've been working with Ian even longer.
translation.ja: 一匹狼だけど イアンとは もっと長いわ

translation.en: He's such a kind soul.
translation.ja: とても優しい人ね

translation.en: -You must be worried sick. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 心配でしょ そうね

translation.en: What do you mean, "loner"?
translation.ja: 一匹狼？

translation.en: Well... you know what? Actually, I could do with a drink.
translation.ja: それは… やっぱり お酒を いただこうかしら

translation.en: Aren't you gonna record our conversation?
translation.ja: 会話を録音する？

translation.en: Oh, no. This is strictly off the record.
translation.ja: まさか　これはオフレコよ

translation.en: Because I tell you, it is a very interesting story.
translation.ja: ものすごく 面白い話があるのよ

translation.en: My life, before I met Ian.
translation.ja: イアンに会う前のこと

translation.en: -Before? Yeah. -Yeah, you know, special interest.
translation.ja: 会う前？ 趣味の話とか

translation.en: Because it might make people engage with their plight even more.
translation.ja: リスナーの興味を引くわよ

translation.en: Well, maybe next time.
translation.ja: 次の機会にお願いするわ

translation.en: I don't wanna add to your... stress.
translation.ja: 今日は お疲れでしょう

translation.en: I mean, sometimes I think that my life has been too dramatic.
translation.ja: あまりに ドラマチックすぎて⸺

translation.en: And I almost wish it was more, like, uh... plain and boring.
translation.ja: もっと つまらない人生なら よかったと思うほど

translation.en: -I should go. Sorry. I'm so sorry. -Clumsy.
translation.ja: もう行きます　すみません 不器用ね

translation.en: [Claire] Nothing yet leads us to give in to anxiety,
translation.ja: 悲観することは ありませんが⸺

translation.en: even if foreign journalists today incur increasingly real risks.
translation.ja: 海外特派員が 危険な仕事なのは事実です

translation.en: [man] Thank you, Claire Maddox. And coming up next, baseball.
translation.ja: ありがとう　クレア 次は野球です

translation.en: If you don't get in touch at all, they're going to think you're dead.
translation.ja: 連絡しないと 死んだと思われる

translation.en: -Or taken hostage, or, yeah. -Taken hostage?
translation.ja: 人質になったとかね 人質？

translation.en: -Yeah. -We're taken hostage.
translation.ja: ああ 俺たちは人質だ

translation.en: -What do you mean? -If we can fake being in Ecuador,
translation.ja: 何だって？ 拘束されたフリをするんだ

translation.en: -we can fake being taken hostage. -That's bad.
translation.ja: 拘束されたフリをするんだ さすがにマズいよ

translation.en: -That's not a good idea. -[Frank] It's not bad, it's genius.
translation.ja: さすがにマズいよ 天才的なアイデアだ

translation.en: You're a genius.
translation.ja: お前は天才だ

translation.en: -Am I? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 僕が？ そうだ

translation.en: -He's a genius. -He is a smart man.
translation.ja: 天才だろ？ 賢いわ

translation.en: -It's a very good idea. -[Finch] Is it?
translation.ja: いいアイデアだ そうか？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: -[Domingo] Baby, you're blocking Ian. -[Brigida] Oh, sorry.
translation.ja: 邪魔だよ ごめん

translation.en: -[Domingo] Okay. Okay. -[Finch] Okay. [Domingo] It's recording.
translation.ja: よし　録画スタート

translation.en: -And... -[Brigida] Wait, wait, wait!
translation.ja: 用意 待って

translation.en: -Okay. -[Domingo] Okay.
translation.ja: いいわ

translation.en: Ready?
translation.ja: いい？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Hello.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Don't smile and say "hello." For God's sake.
translation.ja: 笑顔で“どうも”は ないだろ

translation.en: -What do you mean? -You're in mortal danger.
translation.ja: なんで？ 殺すと脅されてるんだ

translation.en: You got two guys that wanna kill you. Are they high heels?
translation.ja: 殺すと脅されてるんだ 反乱軍の兵士がハイヒール？

translation.en: -What rebel soldier wears high heels? -They make my legs look longer.
translation.ja: 反乱軍の兵士がハイヒール？ 脚が長く見えるの

translation.en: -It looks good, baby. [growls] -[Brigida] Thank you, baby.
translation.ja: きれいだ ありがとう

translation.en: Okay, no smiling. No hello. Just straight to it.
translation.ja: 笑顔は封印　真剣な顔で

translation.en: We are hostages of the Ecuadorian Liberation Front.
translation.ja: エクアドル解放戦線の 人質になりました

translation.en: Um, and I am talking to the president of the United States here
translation.ja: 合衆国大統領に メッセージです

translation.en: when I say the situation is simple. If you do not pay the ransom, we will be executed.
translation.ja: 身代金を支払わないと 殺されます

translation.en: -Stop. Okay. -What?
translation.ja: そこまでだ

translation.en: Why are you talking so casually, so nonchalant?
translation.ja: 口調が軽々しすぎる

translation.en: You gotta be begging. Begging for your life.
translation.ja: 命が懸かってるんだぞ

translation.en: This guy, he wants to kill you.
translation.ja: こいつは お前を殺す気だ

translation.en: He wants to stick you like a pig, so you need to beg.
translation.ja: こいつは お前を殺す気だ 懇願しろ

translation.en: -A nice word to your family, to your wife. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 家族や女房にも言葉を

translation.en: The lens? That's the whole world, right there. -You gotta connect. -Yeah.
translation.ja: レンズの向こうに語りかけろ

translation.en: -Do you understand? -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Okay.
translation.ja: 分かるか？ よし

translation.en: President.
translation.ja: 大統領に懇願　家族に言葉

translation.en: Beg the president, mention the family, yeah, yeah, yeah. Okay.
translation.ja: 大統領に懇願　家族に言葉 任せろ いくぞ

translation.en: No smiling.
translation.ja: 真顔で

translation.en: We are hostages of the Ecuadorian Liberation Front,
translation.ja: 解放戦線の人質になりました

translation.en: and I beg you, Mr. President, please help us.
translation.ja: 大統領 どうか助けてください

translation.en: Also, uh, tell my family I love them, tell my wife--
translation.ja: 家族に愛してると伝え 妻にも…

translation.en: Why are you asking the president to run errands for you?
translation.ja: なんで大統領に伝言を頼む？

translation.en: -Ugh. I don't know, I just-- You said-- -Talk to them directly, to the lens.
translation.ja: だって… レンズを見て自分で伝えろ

translation.en: -Dear Mr. President, wife, family-- -Stop.
translation.ja: 大統領　妻と家族のみんな

translation.en: -Get up. -[groans] What?
translation.ja: やめろ　立て 何だよ

translation.en: -[Frank] Okay. Shake it out. -Oh!
translation.ja: リラックスだ

translation.en: -[Brigida] Take that, American pig! -That wasn't part of the video.
translation.ja: アメリカのブタめ 演技じゃない

translation.en: -What was that for? -To help you get into your role.
translation.ja: 何なんだ 役作りさ

translation.en: Who am I? Daniel Day-Fucking-Lewis? Why am I doing this
translation.ja: 僕はオスカー俳優か 君がやれよ　プロだろ

translation.en: -if you're the charismatic broadcaster? -Exactly. I can't do it.
translation.ja: 君がやれよ　プロだろ 俺だと同情されない

translation.en: No one's gonna feel sorry for me.
translation.ja: 俺だと同情されない

translation.en: I got the looks, I got the charm, I got the body. No sympathy.
translation.ja: 顔も体もイケてるからな

translation.en: You, on the other hand, you begging for your life? It's pathetic.
translation.ja: お前が命乞いすると 哀れに見える

translation.en: It's like an ugly runt, mongrel dog that no one wants,
translation.ja: もらい手のいない ブサイクな犬だ

translation.en: -that has to be put down. -Yeah, I get the point.
translation.ja: もらい手のいない ブサイクな犬だ 分かった

translation.en: [whispers] Didn't have to hit me.
translation.ja: 殴らなくても

translation.en: [Brigida] You've got this, Finch.
translation.ja: やれるわ

translation.en: My name is Ian Finch. This is Frank Bonneville.
translation.ja: 僕はフィンチ 彼はボネビル

translation.en: We work for the New York radio station Q365 News.
translation.ja: Ｑ365ニュースで 働いています

translation.en: As you wish.

translation.en: -[scoffs] You can try. -No, I should just be allowed to hit you.

translation.en: [Finch] My name is Ian Finch. This is Frank Bonneville.
translation.ja: 僕はフィンチ　彼はボネビル

translation.en: We work for the New York radio station Q365 News.
translation.ja: Ｑ365ニュースで 働いています

translation.en: We were reporting here on the unrest in Ecuador
translation.ja: エクアドルで取材中 解放戦線に拘束されて⸺

translation.en: when we were taken hostage by the Ecuadorian Liberation Front.
translation.ja: エクアドルで取材中 解放戦線に拘束されて⸺ 人質になりました

translation.en: We have not been harmed. If America submits to their demands,
translation.ja: まだ無事です 彼らの要求に従えば 解放されます

translation.en: we will be set free to return to the United States.
translation.ja: 彼らの要求に従えば 解放されます

translation.en: -Well, they're still alive. -If their demands are not met, however,
translation.ja: 生きてたか 要求が満たされなければ 処刑されます

translation.en: we will be executed, never to see our families again.
translation.ja: 要求が満たされなければ 処刑されます

translation.en: Please take these people seriously. They want money to fund their cause.
translation.ja: 彼らの目的は 活動資金の調達です

translation.en: They will contact you in the future. Until then, you won't hear from us again.
translation.ja: 次の連絡を待ってください

translation.en: [man]Good evening, and welcome to this special broadcast dedicated to Frank Bonneville and Ian Finch.

translation.en: I'm joined by their colleague, Claire Maddox, from Q365 News.

translation.en: Uh, it's a very worrying time for the press.

translation.en: Nothing can justify taking journalists hostage. The only thing they're guilty of is doing their job.

translation.en: -You know she has a thing for you, right? -Ridiculous.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.

translation.en: -[scoffs] Not anymore you don't. -All right.

translation.en: You need to get over her. Move on.

translation.en: ...danger they face is indifference and being forgotten.

translation.en: and maybe my husband will see it.

translation.en: I've kept silent in the hope that any negotiations would be successful,

translation.en: but the wait is unbearable.

translation.en: And, together, we stand firm for Ian and Frank to return amongst us.
